content: भुवनं [भवत्यत्र, भू-आधारादौ-क्युन्] {@--1@} A world; the number of worlds is either three, as in त्रिभुवन, or fourteen; इह हि भुवनान्यन्ये धीराश्चतुर्दश भुंजते <ls>Bh. 3. 23</ls> (see लोक also); भुवनालोकनप्रीतिः <ls>Ku. 2. 45</ls>; भुवनविदितं <ls>Me. 6.</ls> {@--2@} The earth. {@--3@} Heaven. {@--4@} A being, living creature. {@--5@} Man, mankind. {@--6@} Water. {@--7@} The number ‘fourteen’. {@--8@} Abode, residence (<ab>Ved.</ab>). {@--9@} Becoming prosperous.
